achievements.name: All About the Conquest

achievements.description: 5 Mastered Guardians.

achievements.name: Mage for Life
achievements.description: 5 Mastered Mages.

achievements.name: Assassin for Hire
achievements.description: 5 Mastered Assassins.

achievements.name: Art of War
achievements.description: 5 Mastered Warriors.

achievements.name: Blood and Sand
achievements.description: 25 Arena matches played.

achievements.name: Valiant Jouster
achievements.description: 25 Joust 3v3 matches played.

achievements.name: Master Assailant
achievements.description: 25 Assault matches played.

achievements.name: Adept of Mastery
achievements.description: 40 Gods Mastered.

achievements.name: Siege Breaker
achievements.description: 25 Siege matches played.

achievements.name: Bloodthirster
achievements.description: Get 10 first blood accolades in qualifying matches.

achievements.name: Double Tap
achievements.description: Get 10 double kills in qualifying matches.

achievements.name: Hat Trick
achievements.description: 5 Triple Kills.

achievements.name: Quadra Kill
achievements.description: 1 Quadra Kill.

achievements.name: Rampage
achievements.description: 50 Towers destroyed.

achievements.name: Penta Kill
achievements.description: 1 Penta Kill.

achievements.name: Objective Stealer
achievements.description: Deliver the killing blow on a map objective where enemies did more damage in a qualifying match.

achievements.name: Maxed Out
achievements.description: Reach Level 30.

achievements.name: Diamonds Are Forever
achievements.description: 1 god at Mastery 10.

achievements.name: Fatality
achievements.description: 100 god kills.

achievements.name: Helping Hand
achievements.description: 100 Assists on a god kill.

achievements.name: Can't Stop This
achievements.description: 50 Killing Sprees.

achievements.name: Combo Breaker
achievements.description: Shut down 10 Killing Sprees.

achievements.name: Objective Killer
achievements.description: Get 25 killing blows on map objectives in qualifying matches.

achievements.name: Minion Mayhem
achievements.description: 100 Minions killed.

achievements.name: Omnitheist
achievements.description: Completed a match with a god from all Pantheons.

achievements.name: 20 to 1
achievements.description: Kill enemy gods more than 20 times in a single match, and only die once.

achievements.name: Hard Carry
achievements.description: You killed more than 20 enemy gods in a single Conquest match.

achievements.name: Super Cheer
achievements.description: Win an Arena match with more than 100 tickets remaining.

achievements.name: Survivor
achievements.description: Survived more than 50 battles with less than 10% health.

achievements.name: Cleanup Crew
achievements.description: Kill 3 enemy gods with a single ability.

achievements.name: Death from Above
achievements.description: Killed 25 gods from damage dealt by landing from a leap.

achievements.name: Heals for Days
achievements.description: Healed gods other than yourself for more than 10,000 health.

achievements.name: Precise Shot
achievements.description: Get a double kill where both kills were the result of ranged basic attacks.

achievements.name: Last Hit
achievements.description: Kill 20 minions by getting the last hit with a Basic Attack in a single match.

achievements.name: Fast Blood
achievements.description: You have earned First Blood in any game mode before 0:00 on the in-game clock.

achievements.name: Good Game
achievements.description: Complete a match with 5 or more Kills, 10 or more Assists, and 2 or fewer Deaths.

achievements.name: Jump! Jump!
achievements.description: You have leaped over 100 times with gods that have leaps.

achievements.name: Come Back
achievements.description: Win a match where your team had 4000 less combined gold than the enemy team.

achievements.name: Double Edged Sword
achievements.description: Win a match where your team has killed twice as many gods as the enemy team.

achievements.name: Last Man Standing
achievements.description: Be the only god left alive on either team in any 5v5 game mode.

achievements.name: I Will Find Them!
achievements.description: Destroy 25 enemy wards.

achievements.name: Questions Later
achievements.description: Dealt damage to every enemy player in Arena before any of them damaged you.

achievements.name: Down to the Wire
achievements.description: Win an Arena match where your team has only 20 tickets or less remaining.

achievements.name: Feel the Fury
achievements.description: Reach the maximum Attack Speed of 2.5 in a single match.

achievements.name: Beast Master
achievements.description: Summon 20 Siege Monsters in Siege Mode.

achievements.name: Beast Slayer
achievements.description: Get the killing blow on an enemy Siege Monster in Siege Mode.

achievements.name: Use your Fists
achievements.description: Get the killing blow on an enemy god with a Basic Attack while playing a Guardian.

achievements.name: Fooled You
achievements.description: Get the killing blow on an enemy god using damage reflect.

achievements.name: Perfect
achievements.description: Get the killing blow on an enemy god without taking damage from them.

achievements.name: Destructible
achievements.description: Destroy an enemy tower in Conquest, Clash, or Siege before 8:00 on the in-game clock.

achievements.name: Reborn
achievements.description: Win a game after one of your Phoenixes was destroyed.

achievements.name: After Effect
achievements.description: Kill an enemy god after they had already killed you.

achievements.name: Line Them Up
achievements.description: Hit 3 different enemy gods with a single ability.

achievements.name: Limit Them

achievements.description: Root or Cripple 15 enemy gods.

achievements.name: Up You Go!

achievements.description: As Cernunnos kill 1 enemy God who is currently afflicted by Autumn Decay Debuff while Cernunnos is in a different stance from the Shifter of Seasons Ability.

achievements.name: Pigging Out
achievements.description: As Cernunnos kill 1 enemy God who is currently polymorphed from your Wild Hunt Ability.

achievements.name: Pacifist
achievements.description: As Ganesha give 1 or more kills to an allied God.

achievements.name: Ohm!
achievements.description: As Ganesha silence 3 or more enemy Gods with a single cast of his Ohm ability.

achievements.name: Paolao
achievements.description: As Daji, pull 2 or more enemies into your Paolao with a single use of your Paolao Ability.

achievements.name: Murderous Nature
achievements.description: As Daji, kill an enemy with your Trickster Spirit Ability.

achievements.name: Strategist
achievements.description: As Cu Chulainn kill an enemy within 2 seconds of firing the Barbed Spear Ability and live.

achievements.name: Berserker
achievements.description: As Cu Chulainn transform into Berserk mode by hitting at least 2 gods with the Spear of Mortal Pain Ability.

achievements.name: Invigorate
achievements.description: As Artio reach full stacks on her Invigoration, the passive effect of her Shape shift ability.

achievements.name: Mauled to Death
achievements.description: As Artio kill an enemy God in bear form with Maul Prey.

achievements.name: Mounted Archery
achievements.description: As Hachiman, hit 5 enemy Gods with one use of his ultimate, Mounted Archery.

achievements.name: Number 1 Stunnah
achievements.description: As Hachiman, stun 2 enemy Gods with one use of his Iaijutsu Ability.

achievements.name: Spreading Strife
achievements.description: As Discordia, use the Strife ability to turn 2 enemy God's against each other 3 times in a single match.

achievements.name: Curse of Discord
achievements.description: As Discordia, use your Golden Apple of Discord ability to throw the apple to an enemy and have it spread automatically to 2 other enemies in a single cast.

achievements.name: Soul Expulsion
achievements.description: As Cerberus consume the soul of every enemy god in the game with the use of his Soul Expulsion Ability.

achievements.name: Stygian torment
achievements.description: As Cerberus hit every member of the enemy team with a single cast of your Stygian Torment ability.

achievements.name: Fatally Struck!
achievements.description: As Achilles get 2 or more executes with a single use of his Fatal Strike Ability.

achievements.name: The Crowd Cheers!
achievements.description: As Achilles, heal 12 times in a single use of Radiant Glory.

achievements.name: Fear of the Night
achievements.description: As Chernobog utilize your Crystallized Curses and Vicious Barrage combo to root 3 enemy Gods at once.

achievements.name: True Nightmare
achievements.description: As Chernobog, kill 2 gods after landing and buffed by Living Nightmare.

achievements.name: Spread The Fun
achievements.description: As Baron Samedi, cause 3 enemy gods to be above 30 Hysteria at the same time.

achievements.name: Brush With Death
achievements.description: As Baron Samedi, heal yourself or an ally with Consign Spirits while they are below 5% of their HP.

achievements.name: Get Erupted!
achievements.description: As Pele, hit at least one enemy god with each ring of Eruption in a single ability use.

achievements.name: Everlasting Flame
achievements.description: As Pele, trigger Everlasting Flame and survive 3 separate times in one match.

achievements.name: Argus to the Rescue!
achievements.description: As Hera, have Argus get 2 kills in a single lifetime.

achievements.name: Royal Assault
achievements.description: As Hera, hit an enemy god will all 3 hits of Royal Assault.

achievements.name: True Strike
achievements.description: As King Arthur, hit an enemy with any damaging ability while their protections are reduced by Twin Cleave.

achievements.name: The Legend of Excalibur
achievements.description: As King Arthur, cast Excalibur's Fury and Sundering Strike within 10 seconds of each other.

achievements.name: Elemental Mastery
achievements.description: As Merlin, kill an Enemy god in each stance: Arcane, Fire, and Ice.

achievements.name: Infused with Power
achievements.description: As Merlin, successfully hit Enemy gods 15 times with a basic attack while Overload is active.

achievements.name: The Destroyer
achievements.description: As Jormungandr, kill an enemy with your ultimate The World Serpent.

achievements.name: Toxic Veins
achievements.description: As Jormungandr, fully charge Consuming Bellow and kill 2 enemies with it.

achievements.name: Where we dropping?
achievements.description: As Horus use 'To The Skies!' and take at least 3 allied gods with you.

achievements.name: The Protector King
achievements.description: As Horus, heal an Allied God below 15% health with Protector's Surge.

achievements.name: Rise of the Spawn
achievements.description: As Set, control 6 spawn at one time.

achievements.name: From All Angles
achievements.description: As Set, hit 3 different gods with your spawn with a single instance of Skewer

achievements.name: Fabricated Destiny
achievements.description: As Olorun, reach the maximum critical hit chance possible with Touch of Fate

achievements.name: Eternal Ruler
achievements.description: As Olorun, with a single ability use, kill two enemies within Sanctified Field

achievements.name: Grasping Vines
achievements.description: As Persephone, trap the entire enemy team with one use of her Grasp of Death ability.

achievements.name: Master Harvester
achievements.description: As Persephone, accumulate 150 Pomegranate Seeds over the course of a single match.

achievements.name: Omi Mastery
achievements.description: As Yemoja, gain 3 extra Omi in a single match.

achievements.name: Turbulent Waters
achievements.description: As Yemoja, deal damage to 3 or more enemies in a single use of River's Rebuke.

achievements.name: Far Seeing Sight
achievements.description: As Heimdallr, hit an enemy with Piercing Sight after it has traveled more than 200 ft.

achievements.name: Journey Through the Realms
achievements.description: As Heimdallr, kill 3 enemy gods by sending them through Muspelheim and Niflheim.

achievements.name: Weapon Mastery S
achievements.description: As Mulan, win a match with all weapons fully mastered.

achievements.name: Two for One
achievements.description: As Mulan, hit 2 enemies with all three strikes of Divine Mastery in a single ability use.

achievements.name: The Perfect Brew
achievements.description: As Baba Yaga, use a brewed potion that is 5 of the same type of ingredient.

achievements.name: The Cabin
achievements.description: As Baba Yaga, gain 50 stacks on your items in a single game, utilizing the power from your Cabin.

achievements.name: Whisper of the Old Gods
achievements.description: As Cthulhu, drive each enemy god insane at least once during a single match.

achievements.name: Shattered Mind
achievements.description: As Cthulhu reach full stacks of Sanity Break in a single match.

achievements.name: Full Moon
achievements.description: As Tsukuyomi dash through 12 targets using Piercing Moonlight.

achievements.name: Watch your Step!
achievements.description: As Tsukuyomi, kill an enemy using the Caltrop damage from Silver Moon Caltrops.

achievements.name: Fortuitous Investment
achievements.description: As Danzaburou, fill up all 4 Dubious Savings money pouches in a single match.

achievements.name: The Best Sake Merchant!
achievements.description: As Danzaburou, have 3 enemies taunted at the same time by Alluring Spirits.

achievements.name: Primordial Queen
achievements.description: As Tiamat, defeat two enemies in each of her stances in a single match

achievements.name: Mother of Monsters
achievements.description: As Tiamat, have each of your creature/pets assist on your player kills in a single match

achievements.name: Dropkick Adventure
achievements.description: As Gilgamesh drop kick the same god into a minion, a god, a wall, and the Winds of Shamash wall in a single match.

achievements.name: Quick Turn-In
achievements.description: As Gilgamesh complete the quest obtained at Level 5 while still Level 5.

achievements.name: Power Devoured
achievements.description: As Morgan Le Fay, consume all five Empowered Blade Marks with a single cast of Consuming Power.

achievements.name: Strength Drawn From Pain
achievements.description: As Morgan Le Fay, gain all five Empowered Blade Symbols to reach an empowered state five times in a single match.

achievements.name: The Monster Inside
achievements.description: As Charybdis, reset your Ultimate two or more times in a single use.

achievements.name: Drown your Sorrows
achievements.description: As Charybdis, hit 3 enemy gods with a fully charged Capsize in the same fire.

achievements.name: You Cannot Hide
achievements.description: As Cliodhna, slay two enemy gods while inside a wall with either Banshee's Wail or Tearing the Veil in a single match.

achievements.name: Jump Scare
achievements.description: As Cliodhna, damage an enemy god within 3s of leaving a wall 10 times in a single match.

achievements.name: Are you Burdened?
achievements.description: As Atlas, remove the burdens of 3 allied gods and hit an enemy god in the same Kinetic Charge.

achievements.name: Orbital Cannon
achievements.description: As Atlas, damage 3 enemy gods with the travel portion of Gamma-Ray Burst with a single ultimate cast. This does not include gods in the initial damage area when it begins travelling.

achievements.name: Three Prongs of Trishula
achievements.description: As Shiva, pull 3 enemy gods in a single use of Emblazoned Sweep.

achievements.name: Dance of Bliss and Destruction
achievements.description: As Shiva, heal allies twice and deal damage to enemy gods twice in a single use of Shiva Tandava.

achievements.name: Dragon's Call
achievements.description: As Yu Huang, damage three enemy gods with the explosion damage from Dueling Dragons.

achievements.name: Phoenix Fire
achievements.description: As Yu Huang, kill an enemy god with the burn damage from Flames of the Phoenix.

achievements.name: Jousting Champion
achievements.description: As Lancelot, hit 3 enemy gods while charging during a single use of The Grand Joust.

achievements.name: The Knights Bond
achievements.description: As Lancelot, reach max stacks of Camelotâ€™s Quest during a single match.

achievements.name: Agile Archery
achievements.description: As Ishtar, kill an enemy God with each variation of Imbue Arrows in one match.

achievements.name: Stunning Swordplay
achievements.description: As Ishtar, stun 3 enemy Gods in one cast of Blades of Retribution.

achievements.name: Lifeguard
achievements.description: As Maui use Mystical Ulua to successfully bring 5 allies to you in a single match.

achievements.name: All in a Day's Work
achievements.description: As Maui, successfully knock up 3 gods with a single Landfall.

achievements.name: Kindling Flame
achievements.description: As Surtr, empower Flames of Muspell with bonus damage stacks at least 30 times in a single match.

achievements.name: Taking Aim
achievements.description: As Surtr, hit enemy gods with a Magma Rock, Lane Minion and Fiery Imp using Giant's Grasp in a single match.

achievements.name: Don't Look Up
achievements.description: As Martichoras, hit 3 enemy Gods in a single cast of Death from Above.

achievements.name: Monstrous Mayhem
achievements.description: As Martichoras, reach maximum stacks of Monstrosity in a single game.

achievements.name: Blinding Brilliance
achievements.description: As Ix Chel, blind enemy gods 5 times with Threads of Light in a single match.

achievements.name: Greatest End
achievements.description: As Ix Chel, empower Great End to it's maximum duration.

achievements.name: Tough Customer
achievements.description: As Charon, gain 250 or more Max Health from Ferryman of Souls in one game.

achievements.name: The Underworld Calls
achievements.description: As Charon, hit 5 enemies from at least 500 units away with Summon Styx in one game.

achievements.name: Now It's A Party
achievements.description: As Maman Brigitte, hit 3 enemy gods with a single Explosion of Souls

achievements.name: A Goddess Possessed
achievements.description: As Maman Brigitte, possess enemy gods for a combined 30s in a single match with Spirit Seize

achievements.name: Catchy Tune
achievements.description: As Bake Kujira, time dilate enemy gods for a total of 30 seconds in a single match

achievements.name: Prolific Curses
achievements.description: As Bake Kujira, apply your Amplified Curse to enemy gods 10 times in a single match

achievements.name: Singularity
achievements.description: As Nut, hit an enemy with all possible instances of damage from every shot of a single cast of Convergence

achievements.name: Event Horizon
achievements.description: As Nut, hit 3 enemy Gods with a single cast of Skyfall 3 times within one match
